entries.name: Age
entries: Modrons are born fully mature. Modrons die after exactly 298 years, to the nanosecond.

entries.name: Size
entries: Modron vary precisely in size, depending on their classification. Your Size is determined by your number of sides.

entries.name: Language
entries: Modron speak, read and write Common and Modron.

entries.name: Skills
entries: Modrons are Proficient in Tinker’s Tools.

entries.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: Modron’s minds are regimented, granting them advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed. Creatures also have disadvantage on Deception checks against you to lie.

entries.name: Primus’ Legacy
entries: Modrons can be made in various ways, and depending on the type of Modron you are, you gain different features. When you select this race, select one of the below options. Additionally, when your Proficiency Bonus Increases as a part of leveling up, you can choose another option and replace these features with that.
